welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eggenstein-Leopoldshafen! Get ready to experience the charming blend of historical architecture and modern innovation this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
